title: Chapter 2556 - 2556 Chapter 2556-Non-Human Divine Ancestor Falls
body:
Chapter 2556 - 2556 Chapter 2556-Non-Human Divine Ancestor Falls

2556 Chapter 2556-non-human divine ancestor falls

“d.a.m.n it!”

The ancestral Dragon’s face changed. He controlled the Dragon Horn and slashed at the non-human divine ancestor while shouting,” “Lu Ming, quick, stop him!”

The ancestral Dragon’s voice was filled with panic.

Although Lu Ming was puzzled, he knew that the Golden sigil was most likely of great importance. Otherwise, the ancestral Dragon would not have lost his composure.

Lu Ming pushed his speed to the maximum. At the same time, he exerted all his strength to throw the great. desolation spear.

Whoosh!

Lu Ming’s combat power was doubled, so he was extremely powerful. The great desolation spear turned into a bolt of lightning and flashed toward the non-human divine ancestor.

However, the divine ancestor didn’t care about the ancestral Dragon’s and Lu Ming’s attacks. All he could see was the golden seal.

BOOM!

The non-human divine ancestor slashed at the golden seal like a sword. The golden seal shook violently and exploded with dazzling light.

Si la..

Like a piece of cloth being torn apart, a huge hole was torn on the golden seal.

At that moment, the attacks of the ancestral Dragon and Lu Ming arrived.

Pfft! Pift!

The Dragon Horn controlled by the ancestral Dragon hit the back of the non-human divine ancestor, almost cutting him in half.

At the same time, Lu Ming’s great desolation spear stabbed the non-human divine ancestor from the back to the front.

The non-human divine ancestor had been severely injured, and his aura was extremely weak,

However, his face was filled with madness.

“Hahaha, the heaven suppressing scal has been torn apart, and the experts from the outside world are coming. Ancestral Dragon, what’s the point of sealing the sky? you’re still going to die, all of you! Hahaha!”

The non-human divine ancestor laughed maniacally. Ile didn’t try to hide his voice, and it echoed throughout the entire heavenly realm.

On the battlefield of the ruins of end and the battlefield of two world city, everyone’s expression changed when they heard this voice. They were all shocked.

The faces of the evil G.o.d tribe members were especially pale.

It was obvious that the non-human divine ancestor had lost!

“How did this happen?”

All the members of the evil G.o.d race found hard to believe and accept.

If the divine ancestor had lost, then they would lose for sure!

“Retreat, retreat….

All of a sudden, the evil G.o.d tribe’s morale was completely destroyed, and they retreated frantically. “Kill!”

The people from the heaven realm went on a killing spree.

They didn’t understand what the non-human divine ancestor meant, but they knew that the non-human divine ancestor had lost.

Therefore, their morale was greatly boosted, and they were completely chasing after the evil G.o.d tribe. ‘Moke, you crazy…

The ancestral Dragon roared and charged at the non-human divine ancestor.

‘I’m crazy. The ones who are crazy are you and that old fellow Zhenyu. Both of you are stubborn and overconfident…

The non-human divine ancestor laughed bitterly and used his remaining power to attack the golden scal He was going all out. When he saw Lu Ming’s combat strength increase and sacred ancestor bloodheart killed, he knew that he would not be able to survive. Lu Ming and the ancestral Dragon had joined forces. He would definitely die. That was why he had attacked the Golden sigil crazily.

His original plan was to flatten the heaven realm and kill the ancestral Dragon before slowly tearing the golden scal.

This time, he didn’t succeed and was stopped by the ancestral Dragon. At the same time, Lu Ming had arrived and joined forces to attack the non-human divine ancestor.

The non-human divine ancestor had just been severely injured by the two of them and was extremely weak. He wasn’t their match at all.

After a few moves, Lu Ming punched a hole through the divine ancestor’s body and he was torn apart by Zulong’s dragon claws.

‘Ancestral Dragon, I’ll be waiting for you below …

The non-human divine ancestor laughed before the ancestral Dragon controlled his horn to split his head in half.

Thus, the non-human divine ancestor and the sacred ancestor bloodheart had been completely annihilated.

It was supposed to be a huge victory, but there was no joy on the ancestral Dragon’s face. Instead, he looked a little dejected.

AI!

Looking at the torn golden seal, the ancestral Dragon sighed helplessly.

“Senior, this is…”

Lu Ming was filled with doubts and was about to ask.

BOOM!

At this moment, an extremely terrifying aura came from the crack in the golden scal. Even with Lu Ming’s current cultivation base, he felt frightened and could not resist this aura.

Zu long and Lu Ming retreated rapidly.

“What’s that?”

At that moment, Lu Ming’s eyes suddenly widened in shock.

That was because there were two b.a.l.l.s of light behind the crack. They seemed to be a pair of eyes, and they were bright and terrifying.

Lu Ming’s heart beat faster as he faced the two light orbs. It was as if he was an ant facing a giant beast from the ancient times.

I’ve been discovered. A great calamity will soon befall us!

Zu long sighed.

However, the two b.a.l.l.s of light flickered a few times and disappeared.

“Senior, what is that?”

Lu Ming asked.

the powerful beings outside have their eyes on this place. However, they won’t be able to enter for the time being. Let’s go and exterminate the remaining cvil G.o.d tribe members first before we talk about this in detail!

Zulong said.

“Alright!”

Lu Ming nodded. Although he was curious, he was not in a hurry. He took a step forward and charged toward the battlefield in two work city.

As for the ancestral Dragon, he headed towards the battlefield of the ultimate.

At this moment, the evil G.o.d tribe’s sky breaking Army had almost been completely annihilated by Xic nianqing and Xie nianjun. All 100000 powerhouses had fallen.

The evil G.o.d tribe was completely one-sided.

They knew that the non-human divine ancestor was finished. They didn’t have the courage to fight anymore.

It wasn’t just the ordinary experts that were fleeing. Even the celestial Thearch and demiG.o.ds were fleeing.

first, you escaped so quickly. If you have the ability, let’s fight to the death!

Venerable sovereign Renegade was right behind the number one king.

The number one King’s face was gloomy. He didn’t say a word and madly tore open s.p.a.ce to escape.

The other non-human demiG.o.ds were the same.

Whoosh!

Suddenly, a black sword light flashed, and a non-human demiG.o.d nearby was killed.

Then, a figure appeared. It was Xie nianqing!

Xie nianqing’s eyes were cold as he looked at the number one king.

The number one King’s face was as white as snow.

Xie nianqing’s combat power was too strong. He was no match for him. If he was targeted, he would die.

“Rebellion, if you’re going to die, then die together!”

All of a sudden, the number one king revealed a ferocious look. He did not run away, Instead, he rushed toward venerable sovereign ni Luan. His body burst with terrifying fluctuations.

“Self-destruct…

Venerable sovereign Renegade’s expression changed drastically. The number one king knew that he couldn’t

escape, so he decided to risk everything and die with venerable sovereign Renegade.

His strength was similar to that of venerable sovereign Renegade. If he chose to self-destruct, venerable sovereign Renegade would most likely die as well.

Venerable sovereign rebellion retreated frantically, but he couldn’t do so at the moment.

At this moment, a purple-gold hand suddenly appeared and grabbed at the number one king.

“Ah!”

The number one king roared. He wanted to sell-destruct, but it was too late. He was directly caught by the purple-gold hand. With a squeeze, the number one king died on the spot.

Then, a figure flashed and Lu Ming appeared.

is this the combat strength of a martial G.o.d?”

Venerable sovereign rebellion was shocked.

The number one king, who was not weaker than him, self-destructed with all his might. However, in Lu Ming’s hands, he could not even sell-destruct. He was like an ant that was crushed to death.

in

23
